    Show All Events #rightside Country Club Membership Enhancements All residents of The Villages automatically enjoy free membership to all of our country club facilities, with access to Championship golf, dining and shopping. A Country Club Enhancement program offers even greater access and benefits for your active lifestyle, offered in 1 month, 6 months and annual options.

    Download Priority Membership Application

    Purchase Membership Enhancements and Trail Pass *Must reside in the same household. You must be a resident of The Villages to be eligible for Membership Enhancements and Trail Pass. Membership Enhancements and Trail Passes are non-refundable, non-transferable and are subject to Florida state sales tax. Prices shown are subject to change without notice. All fees plus tax Download Priority Membership Credit Request

    Show All Events #rightside Havana - Staff Rick Kleindienst Golf Staff Lead Hometown: Stratford, New York Rick and his wife Priscilla moved to The Villages in January 2010 from Stratford, Connecticut. Prior to moving to The Villages Rick was Manager of Emergency Management for the Yale New Haven Health System, New Haven Connecticut for 8 years. Before that he was the Executive Director of the Southwestern Regional Communications Center for 18 years which provides fire and EMS dispatching to 14 municipalities in southwestern Connecticut. Rick has been an emergency medical technician for 34 years which includes 25 years as an advanced life support technician. He is also an American Heart Association CPR Instructor. He was also the Program Director for the Sumter County Medical Reserve Corps which is sponsored by the Sumter County Health Department. Rick and Priscilla have four sons and seven grandchildren. They both love to play golf and enjoy outside activities (12 months a year) which was the driving force why they moved to The Villages. Not having to shovel snow or scrape ice also played a big part in their decision process. Rick and Priscilla live in the Village of Hadley with Bandit, their three year old golden retriever. Jennifer Hibbard Staff Lead Hometown: Buffalo, New York My husband Ed and I are originally from Buffalo, NY. Previously we lived in Saratoga Springs NY and Charlotte, NC, before moving to the Villages in 2014. My former career was in the Chemical Industry for over 25 yrs. Shortly after moving to The Villages, both Ed and I went to work at the Golf Shops, Ed as a Sales Associate at Evans Prairie and I at Havana CC as a Sales Associate. In 2019, I became the Hybrid Staff Supervisor at Havana CC. Since moving here we have met many new friends. We enjoy playing golf and take advantage of everything the Villages has to offer. We have family in the Buffalo area and two granddaughters that are in the Rochester NY. Go Bills! Mike Fitzwater Golf Staff lead I grew up in small town in North Central Pennsylvania and graduated from Cowanesque Valley High School in 1972. Upon graduation enlisted in the Navy and was accepted to the Nuclear Power Training program. After completing this program served another 4 years on submarines completing 6 years of service on active duty and then served another 15 years in the reserves and retired as a Chief Petty Officer in 1993. In addition to this I worked 33 years in the natural gas industry retiring as an operations supervisor in 2013. I moved to The Villages and started working in Golf & Tennis in July 2014. My wife (Val) and I have a daughter, two sons, eight grandchildren and a great granddaughter. David Epperson Golf Staff Lead Hometown: Richmond, Kentucky David and his wife bought in The Villages in 2010 and became full-time residents November 2015. He worked in education for 34 years, graduating from the University of Kentucky with a Bachelors in Music Education. He also earned a Masters of Music Education and Rank I (administrative) certification from Eastern Kentucky University. David and Karen have a son (Christopher) and daughter (Jessica), who both live in the area with their families. David has worked for Villages Golf since January of 2016 and is thrilled to be a member of the Southern Oaks team ï¿½ stop in and say hello! Steward Munn Golf Staff Lead

    Hometown: Plainfield, Illinois

    My wife Jean and I moved to The Villages in 2013 from Orlando after living in various cities in Florida since 1969. In 2014 I joined the Havana team and The Villages Golf & Tennis in 2014. We have a son who lives in Panama and we really appreciate being here in The Villages and the lifestyle that it has to offer.

    Gil Vailancourt Tournament Liaison

    Hometown: Manchester, New Hampshire

    Originally from  Thetford Mines Quebec.My wife Linda and I moved to The Villages from New Hampshire in 2016 after retiring as a Postal Manager in 2013. I started at Evans Prairie as an Ambassador/Starter, becoming the Tournament Liaison at Havana CC in 2019.  Although fairly new to the Havana family, I find the staff a pleasure to work with. Hobbies include golf an dpickle ball.  My parents, two brothers, sister and their spouses also live in The Villages.  Linda and I are very fortunate to have such a close knit family.  Linda and I have 3 children and 6 grandchildren.
